Package capstone.Extras

Class Helper

java.lang.Object
capstone.Extras.Helper
public final class Helper extends Object
A Helper Class with all properties and methods that are generally needed across the application.
Since:
2020-11-1
Version:
1.0
Author:
Bhargav

  • Method Details

    • load

      public static void load()
      A load function that prints progress bars across the screen at 500ms intervals.

    • pause

      public static void pause()
      A pause function that waits for the user to press the Enter key to proceed on with the next task.

    • formatTime

      public static org.joda.time.DateTime formatTime(DayOfWeek day, int hour_24, int minute)
      A date formatter that takes in the current day and time and returns a DateTime object.
      Parameters:
      day - A DayOfWeek Enum corresponding to the day of the week.
      hour_24 - The hour in 24 hour format.
      minute - The minutes of the hour.
      Returns:
      A DateTime Object.

    • getPasswordInput

      public static String getPasswordInput()
      A method to read passwords from Console without displaying the characters on the screen.
      Returns:
      A String representing the password that was keyed in.

    • readLine

      public static String readLine()
      Reads standard input using the Scanner.
      Returns:
      The read input in capitalised form.

    • readTime

      public static String readTime() throws Exception
      Reads time input using Scanner. Prints error message if invalid format.
      Returns:
      24 hour time.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the time does not meet the specified format.

    • printSmallSpace

      public static void printSmallSpace()
      Prints 3 lines of space

      Prints 5 lines of space

      public static void printLargeSpace()
      Prints 7 lines of space

    • getUserAttributes

      public static Object[] getUserAttributes(boolean isCustomer, boolean requireUsername)
      Method that prints and acquires user attributes.
      Parameters:
      isCustomer - false when it is Teller or Admin else true
      requireUsername - the function will not print and acquire Username filed when this sets to false

    • getInputWithValidation

      public static String getInputWithValidation(String prompt, Function<String,Boolean> validator, boolean isPassword)
      Method that acquires inputs with validation.
      Parameters:
      prompt - guiding message to user for the input field
      validator - function checks if the input is valid; return false if it's invalid
      isPassword - true when the input field is a password.

    • isValidPassword

      public static boolean isValidPassword(String password)
      Method that checks password pattern for validation.
      Parameters:
      password - the password input

    • isValidNric

      public static boolean isValidNric(String nric)
      Method that checks nric pattern for validation.
      Parameters:
      nric - the nric input

      Method that checks email pattern for validation.
      Parameters:
      email - the email input

    • isValidPhoneNumber

      public static boolean isValidPhoneNumber(String phoneNumber)
      Method that checks phoneNumber pattern for validation.
      Parameters:
      phoneNumber - the phoneNumber input

    • getUser

      public static void getUser(String userType, String prompt)
      Method that asks for userName and print the userCredentials accordingly. This function words for all roles including Customer,admin and teller.
      Parameters:
      userType - role of the user. customer for Customer, teller for Teller and admin for Admin
      prompt - initial prompt message to acquire username

    • validateUser

      public static <T extends User> T validateUser(String userType) throws Exception
      Method that acquires username and password; Validates if it's a exisiting user in the db
      Parameters:
      userType - customer or admin or teller type
      Throws:
      Exception

    • printUserCredentials

      public static void printUserCredentials(String tableHeader, String firstName, String lastName, String password, String nric, String email, Date dob, String address, String phoneNumber)
      Method that prints the user's credentials in table format.
      Parameters:
      tableHeader - the tableheader
      firstName - user's firsname
      lastName - user's lassname
      password - user's password
      nric - user's nric
      email - user's email
      dob - user's date of birth
      address - user's address
      phoneNumber - user's phoneNumber

    • UpdateDb

      public static void UpdateDb(User user, String firstName, String lastName, String password, String nric, String email, Date dob, String address, String phoneNumber)
      Method that attempts to update user's credentials into database.
      Parameters:
      user - the to be updated
      firstName - user's updated firsname
      lastName - user's updated lassname
      password - user's updated password
      nric - user's updated nric
      email - user's updated email
      dob - user's updated date of birth
      address - user's updated address
      phoneNumber - user's updated phoneNumber
